text: Cruzeiro Futebol Clube, commonly known as Cruzeiro, is a Brazilian football club based in Cruz das Almas, Bahia state. ==History== The club was founded on September 26, 1967. Cruzeiro won the Campeonato Baiano Second Level in 1998. ==Achievements== * Campeonato Baiano Second Level: ** Winners (1): 1998 ==Stadium== Cruzeiro Futebol Clube play their home games at Estádio Municipal Carmelito Barbosa Alves, nicknamed Barbosão. The stadium has a maximum capacity of 8,000 people. ==References== Category:Association football clubs established in 1967 Category:Football clubs in Bahia Category:1967 establishments in Brazil
title: Cruzeiro Futebol Clube (BA)
